main event: A sighting of a fiery object traveling in a straight path with steady forward motion was reported on August 5, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting was characterized as a fiery dollar-shaped object., The event took place in multiple locations: Flushing, Levittown, and Great Neck in New York., The sighting lasted for about two minutes., The witness was described as a high school student who was just looking at the stars when the object was observed., No known cause or explanation for the sighting was provided.
